ter decimal point. From Table 1, we can see that our proposed 
Base-WSOLB model is better than previous three AEDs model, 
but it is still a little worse compared with the NT model. In the 
experiment, we additionally learn that the effect of adding soft-
max to Base WSOLB became worse. This case may indicate 
that the fixed sum of coefficients is not effective.
